attributes.title: Fortnite Battle Royale Rap - "Battle Bus Boogie"
attributes.caption: Battle Royale is what the all the cool kids are playing these days. And you know what!? They're listening to this song too.
attributes.description: Battle Royale is what the all the cool kids are playing these days. And you know what!? They're listening to this song too.
attributes.display_title: Fortnite Battle Royale Rap - "Battle Bus Boogie"

attributes.title: Fact Rap Challenge
attributes.caption: We wanted to do something different this weekend and so here you have this Fact Rap Challenge!
attributes.description: We wanted to do something different this weekend and so here you have this Fact Rap Challenge!

attributes.title: Cuphead Rap (Animated)
attributes.caption: Cuphead gets a new 3D look in this animated video of our Cuphead Rap.
attributes.description: Cuphead gets a new 3D look in this animated video of our Cuphead Rap.

attributes.title: FNAF 6 Song - "Now Hiring at Freddy's" (Live Action Music Vid)
attributes.caption: Phil has hit rock bottom. When things seem bleakest an opportunity at Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria presents itself that is too good to pass up...but did he really have a choice?
attributes.description: Phil has hit rock bottom. When things seem bleakest an opportunity at Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria presents itself that is too good to pass up...but did he really have a choice?
attributes.display_title: FNAF 6 Song - "Now Hiring at Freddy's" (Live Action Music Vid)

attributes.title: Warframe Rap - "A Tenno's Dream"
attributes.caption: We've been getting song requests for this game for as long as we can remember. We hope this Warframe Rap lives up to the hype!
attributes.description: We've been getting song requests for this game for as long as we can remember. We hope this Warframe Rap lives up to the hype! Thank you to Fabvl for dropping some verses on this track!

attributes.title: Monster Hunter World Rap - "The Beast Within"
attributes.caption: Monster Hunter World is both "fun and peppy" while also being "morbid and cruel"...we combined those things into a Rap.
attributes.description: Monster Hunter World is both "fun and peppy" while also being "morbid and cruel"...we combined those things into a Rap.
attributes.display_title: Monster Hunter World Rap - "The Beast Within"

attributes.title: PUBG Rap - "4 Loco"
attributes.caption: We try something new with this PUBG song and have a lot of collaborators join in as well. Thank you to Nerdout, Neebs Gaming, Kronno Zomber and Andrea Kaden for jumping on this song!
attributes.description: We try something new with this PUBG song and have a lot of collaborators join in as well. Thank you to Nerdout, Neebs Gaming, Kronno Zomber and Andrea Kaden for jumping on this song!

attributes.title: Team Fortress 2 Rap - "Meet The Crew"
attributes.caption: We revisit and remaster one our classic songs, which is about all the characters of Team Fortress 2.
attributes.description: We revisit and remaster one our classic songs, which is about all the characters of Team Fortress 2. Thank you to Razzlet for animating this video.

attributes.title: "We Got Hours" - Music Video
attributes.caption: You've seen all the other YouTubers make these raps and flex. We decided to show them how it's really done. They have Lambos. We have a PT Cruiser. They have money. We Got Hours.
attributes.description: You've seen all the other YouTubers make these raps and flex. We decided to show them how it's really done. They have Lambos. We have a PT Cruiser. They have money. We Got Hours.

attributes.title: Sea of Thieves Rap - "Booty Bound"
attributes.caption: Argggg! Here's a shanty for ye crew to listen to while ye sails the seas in Sea of Thieves.
attributes.description: Argggg! Here's a shanty for ye crew to listen to while ye sails the seas in Sea of Thieves.

attributes.title: Far Cry 5 Rap - "Shepherd of this Flock"
attributes.caption: We get Miracle of Sound on another Far Cry Rap chorus and it turned out amazing. You'll be humming this tune as you take out cultists in Hope County.
attributes.description: We get Miracle of Sound on another Far Cry Rap chorus and it turned out amazing. You'll be humming this tune as you take out cultists in Hope County.
attributes.display_title: Far Cry 5 Rap - "Shepherd of this Flock"

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Rogue Song - "Forsake Me Now" (Remastered)
attributes.caption: Ubisoft remastered Assassin's Creed Rogue so we remastered our song for the game. Pretty simple of a concept, eh?
attributes.description: Ubisoft remastered Assassin's Creed Rogue so we remastered our song for the game. Pretty simple of a concept, eh?
attributes.display_title: Assassin's Creed Rogue Song - "Forsake Me Now" (Remastered)

attributes.title: ELON MUSK RAP - "Elon Musk Vs The World"
attributes.caption: This song goes out to all the Elon Musk doubters.
attributes.description:
This song goes out to all the Elon Musk doubters. 

Really though, we dig what this dude does and his vision for humanity and wanted to try something new so things stay fresh. Sombra vs Spy Rap Battle coming at you next week! Thanks to Divide for his vocals on the chorus!
attributes.display_title: ELON MUSK RAP - "Elon Musk Vs The World"

attributes.title: God of War Rap - "Follow Father"
attributes.caption: JT Music's track for God of War featuring a Norwegian metal band's instrumentals. Thanks for Trollfest for helping out on the song!
attributes.description: JT Music's track for God of War featuring a Norwegian metal band's instrumentals. Thanks for Trollfest for helping out on the song!

attributes.title: Han Solo Rap - "Never Tell Me The Odds"
attributes.caption: In between smuggling runs, Han Solo and his cohorts take a break at a cantina and things take a sour turn. Oh and it's all rapped.
attributes.description: In between smuggling runs, Han Solo and his cohorts take a break at a cantina and things take a sour turn. Oh and it's all rapped.
attributes.display_title: Han Solo Rap - "Never Tell Me The Odds"

attributes.title: Dark Souls Song - "Undead Lullaby"
attributes.caption: It's complete! We've covered all the Dark Souls games now with this Dark Souls Song.
attributes.description: It's complete! We've covered all the Dark Souls games now with this Dark Souls Song.

attributes.title: Westworld Song Tribute - "I Wonder"
attributes.caption: We're huge Westworld fans and just had to do a song for it. What do you think it will happen in the Season 2 finale?!
attributes.description: We're huge Westworld fans and just had to do a song for it. What do you think it will happen in the Season 2 finale?!

attributes.title: Dead by Daylight Rap - "You Can Hang"
attributes.caption: As usual, better late then never! Here's our Dead by Daylight Rap! Hope it was worth the wait :)
attributes.description: As usual, better late then never! Here's our Dead by Daylight Rap! Hope it was worth the wait :)
attributes.display_title: Dead by Daylight Rap - "You Can Hang"

attributes.title: Detroit: Become Human Rap - "Deviations"
attributes.caption: We gave Detroit Become Human a look and were very intrigued by it. So here's a rap for it!
attributes.description: We gave Detroit Become Human a look and were very intrigued by it. So here's a rap for it!

attributes.title: Realm Royale Rap - "Burning Embers"
attributes.caption: Realm Royale...is it a contender for the Battle Royale Crown?! How about this Realm Royale Rap? Is it deserving of the title?
attributes.description: Realm Royale...is it a contender for the Battle Royale Crown?! How about this Realm Royale Rap? Is it deserving of the title? Thanks to Rocking Gaming for collabing with us!

attributes.title: Bioshock 2 Rap - "Daddy's Home"
attributes.caption: We were so happy to see the Bioshock 1 Rap do well. And because of that we're giving you guys the Bioshock 2 Rap!!!
attributes.description: We were so happy to see the Bioshock 1 Rap do well. And because of that we're giving you guys the Bioshock 2 Rap!!!

attributes.title: Baldi's Basics Rap
attributes.caption: We caved. We did it. Here's a Baldi's Basics Rap. Worth the wait?
attributes.description: We caved. We did it. Here's a Baldi's Basics Rap. Worth the wait?

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Rap Megamix
attributes.caption: We remixed ALL the Assassin's Creed songs we ever made into this "megamix"! Enjoy!
attributes.description: We remixed ALL the Assassin's Creed songs we ever made into this "megamix"! Enjoy!

attributes.title: We Happy Few Song - "Anytime You Smile"
attributes.caption: We've been interested and following We Happy Few for a while now and finally it's out...so that means we made the song. Enjoy!
attributes.description: We've been interested and following We Happy Few for a while now and finally it's out...so that means we made the song. Enjoy!
attributes.display_title: We Happy Few Song - "Anytime You Smile"

attributes.title: Dark Souls Song (Acoustic Mix)
attributes.caption: The choruses from our Dark Souls songs have always been personal faves. We decided to reenvision them in this Acoustic Mix ALSO with a new live action music video.
attributes.description: The choruses from our Dark Souls songs have always been personal faves. We decided to reenvision them in this Acoustic Mix ALSO with a new live action music video.

attributes.title: Fortnite Rap - "Never Give Up"
attributes.caption: What's it look like in the Battle Bus? Do you have friends that you carry in Fortnite? WHO IS THE BUS DRIVER!? Find all that in this music video.
attributes.description: What's it look like in the Battle Bus? Do you have friends that you carry in Fortnite? WHO IS THE BUS DRIVER!? Find all that in this music video.

attributes.title: Spider-Man Rap - "With Great Power"
attributes.caption: Despite evacuating and working remote, we got you guys this Spider-Man Rap ONLY a little bit late. We hope you enjoy it and stay safe out there fellow Florence homies.
attributes.description: Despite evacuating and working remote, we got you guys this Spider-Man Rap ONLY a little bit late. We hope you enjoy it and stay safe out there fellow Florence homies.

attributes.title: Fallout New Vegas Rap - "Welcome to the Strip"
attributes.caption: Another classic you've been asking for! Enjoy our take on a Fallout New Vegas Rap!!!
attributes.description: Another classic you've been asking for! Enjoy our take on a Fallout New Vegas Rap!!!
attributes.display_title: Fallout New Vegas Rap - "Welcome to the Strip"

attributes.title: The Last of Us Rap - "A Reason to Live" (Remastered)
attributes.caption: We're gearing up for a HUGE push of original video game raps this fall so this week we prepared a remastered version of our The Last of Us Rap. What other old songs would you like to see remastered one day?
attributes.description: We're gearing up for a HUGE push of original video game raps this fall so this week we prepared a remastered version of our The Last of Us Rap. What other old songs would you like to see remastered one day?
attributes.display_title: The Last of Us Rap - "A Reason to Live" (Remastered)

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Odyssey Rap - "Blade With No Name"
attributes.caption: Another Assassin's Creed game, another Assassin's Creed Rap. Where does this AC Odyssey Rap rank among our songs for the franchise?
attributes.description: Another Assassin's Creed game, another Assassin's Creed Rap. Where does this AC Odyssey Rap rank among our songs for the franchise?
attributes.display_title: Assassin's Creed Odyssey Rap - "Blade With No Name"

attributes.title: Call of Duty Black Ops 4 Rap - "Blood Drunk"
attributes.caption: Making these Call of Duty Raps is basically our call to duty at this point. Blackout mode makes things fresh and we hope you dig this track!
attributes.description: Making these Call of Duty Raps is basically our call to duty at this point. Blackout mode makes things fresh and we hope you dig this track!
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty Black Ops 4 Rap - "Blood Drunk"

attributes.title: Baldi's Basics Rap (Animated)
attributes.caption: A 3D re-imagining of our recent Baldi's Basics Rap.
attributes.description: A 3D re-imagining of our recent Baldi's Basics Rap.

attributes.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Rap - "Ride or Die"
attributes.caption: Red Dead Redemption 2 is here...FINALLY. Okay, this video is uploaded. I'm going home now and playing RDR2 for 8 hours straight. PEACE.
attributes.description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is here...FINALLY. Okay, this video is uploaded. I'm going home now and playing RDR2 for 8 hours straight. PEACE.
attributes.display_title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Rap - "Ride or Die"

attributes.title: Venom Rap - "No Hero"
attributes.caption: Movie was meh, but the character and his tone was well worth us exploring in musical form. We hope you dig it!
attributes.description: Movie was meh, but the character and his tone was well worth us exploring in musical form. We hope you dig it!

attributes.title: Spyro Rap (feat. Jeremy Dooley) - "Burn 'Em Down"
attributes.caption: Big thanks to the #1 Spyro fan in the land, Jeremy, for spitting hot fire just like his purple dragon friend does.
attributes.description: Big thanks to the #1 Spyro fan in the land, Jeremy, for spitting hot fire just like his purple dragon friend does.

attributes.title: Fallout 76 Rap - 76 Reasons
attributes.caption: Fallout 76 is Fallout but you can play with the boys. So of course we bring out the squad for this Rap. Enjoy!
attributes.description: Fallout 76 is Fallout but you can play with the boys. So of course we bring out the squad for this Rap. Enjoy!

attributes.title: Battlefield V Rap - "Through the Firestorm"
attributes.caption: Battlefield V is here! ...And so is this rap featuring the talents of Andrea Kaden and Miracle of Sound.
attributes.description: Battlefield V is here! ...And so is this rap featuring the talents of Andrea Kaden and Miracle of Sound.

attributes.title: Bendy and the Ink Machine Song - "Can't Be Erased"
attributes.caption: Bendy and the Ink Machine is available now on Xbox One, PS4, and Nintendo Switch. Thank you for the sponsorship!
attributes.description: Bendy and the Ink Machine is available now on Xbox One, PS4, and Nintendo Switch. Thank you for the sponsorship!
attributes.display_title: Bendy and the Ink Machine Song - "Can't Be Erased"

attributes.title: Just Cause 4 Rap - "Adrenaline Junkie"
attributes.caption: We made this rap Just 'Cause. Heh...we're so clever.
attributes.description: We made this rap Just 'Cause. Heh...we're so clever.

attributes.title: The JT Music Rap - Celebrating 10 Years on YouTube!
attributes.caption: We did it. We made it 10 years on YouTube making video game songs. Thanks to all of you for support!
attributes.description: We did it. We made it 10 years on YouTube making video game songs. Thanks to all of you for support!
attributes.display_title: The JT Music Rap - Celebrating 10 Years on YouTube!
